text: André Ptaszynski (7 May 1953 – 29 July 2020) was a British theatre producer. He was a president of The Society of London Theatre and was on the board of the Royal National Theatre from 2001 to 2010. He died on 29 July 2020 at the age of 67.Producer Andre Ptaszynski has died aged 67André Ptaszynski obituary ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British television producers Category:Theatre producers
title: Andre Ptaszynski
